title: Dessau Pro Regular--available alone?
content: Is there anyway to get Dessau Pro Regular, from Fountain, for use in a logo, alone, without the family--I have a logo I designed in a previous forum that could make good use of it. But I don't know how much it would cost and I can't seem to find it unless as a packaged family.
author: evanbrog

comments.content: Fountain has chosen to offer all its families as packaged products. But maybe if you email the foundry directly they can handle your special request.

That was my first thought, so I tried that, but they never wrote back!

Anybody know how to get their attention?! In the meantime, perhaps I'll write a follow up email.

Evan – I'm going to email you right away. Our inetrnet provider apparently had your emails filtered too hard.

/p
